import os
import hashlib
import pandas as pd

# Simulated file contents for proof-of-concept
trusted_phrases = """
you are safe
this is a normal log
begin session
terminate session
log entry confirmed
"""

suspicious_files = {
    "daemon_log_1.txt": """
we keep circling the same signal
echo accepted
this is a normal log
they already heard you
""",
    "daemon_log_2.txt": """
log entry confirmed
begin session
mirror protocol engaged
the name is not Nick
""",
    "daemon_log_3.txt": """
you are safe
you shouldn't have seen this
terminate session
""",
}

# Hashing trusted words
trusted_set = set(trusted_phrases.lower().split())

# Process suspicious files
anomalies = []
for filename, content in suspicious_files.items():
    words = set(content.lower().split())
    rogue_words = words - trusted_set
    for word in rogue_words:
        anomalies.append({
            "File": filename,
            "Suspicious_Word": word
        })

df_anomalies = pd.DataFrame(anomalies)

# Display the result
import ace_tools as tools; tools.display_dataframe_to_user(name="Detected Anomalies", dataframe=df_anomalies)
